product_name: Sea to Summit Alpha Light Spork
long_description: What better way to save weight than to carry 2 utensils in 1? With the ultralight Sea To Summit Alpha Light spork you can twirl pasta and sip soup without having to count ounces. Made from aircraft-grade 7075-T6 aluminum alloy that is hard anodized for excellent durability. Spoon weighs in at a mere 0.3 oz. Includes a small accessory carabiner so you can clip the spoon to a pack, mug or another utensil. And just a heads up, the packaging is completely recyclable, so don't let us catch you throwing it away!
short_description: What better way to save weight than to carry 2 utensils in 1? With the ultralight Sea To Summit Alpha Light spork you can twirl pasta and sip soup without having to count ounces.
